problem.title: Until then, his family ________ from him for six months.

question.analysis: 直到刚才，表明从“刚才”以后我有他的消息了，表示过去我没有他的消息，所以用 “hadn't heard”
question.questionattrs: A didn’t hear;-;B hasn’t been hearing;-;C hasn’t heard;-;D hadn’t heard
